dct_alternative_sm: Tribus Juda id est, pars illa Terrae Sanctae, quam in ingressu tribus Juda consecuta fuit
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miliaria vnius horae".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Sites of interest are numbered (there is no key present).
From Adrichem's Theatrum Terrae Sanctae. Koeln : Officina Birckmannica, 1590.
